content:
Scenario: Community recognition of parent expertise in child development
    Given Sarah has professional-grade expertise in child development
    And she is an experienced teacher and parent
    When the community seeks expertise on children's issues
    Then Sarah's knowledge should be valued and consulted
    And parent expertise should be recognized alongside professional credentials
    And she should be invited to community policy discussions
    And her care tokens should reflect her knowledge contributions
    And the community should tap parent expertise for decision-making
    And parenting experience should be valued as legitimate expertise
